name: Soul Saber 2
description: Extreme high speed (rip off) teamwork action has arrived on Steam, in the form of a shooting game! As a Droid soldier, fight through the 6 on 6 online/offline team battle, and achieve victory!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4Ghz Memory: 1000 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0b compatible DirectX: Version 9.0b Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound compatible Additional Notes: Gamepad is highly recommended. Low latency broadband is required for multiplayer.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 10 Processor: Core i5 Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia / AMD (1GB VRAM) DirectX: Version 9.0b Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound compatible Additional Notes: Gamepad is highly recommended.  Low latency broadband is required for multiplayer.
